item.title: 欧洲银行的辉煌业绩内幕：迈向还是超越甜蜜点？
item.description: 今年以来涨幅超过 40% 的欧洲银行股面临考验，法国再次出现的不确定性已经对市场情绪构成挑战。【原文：Resurgent European bank shares, up over 40% this year, face testing times with sentiment already being challenged by renewed French uncertainty.】

item.title: 早间竞价等待 PCE 为利率提供线索
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 说明：微量豁免的终止将如何影响美国消费者和企业
item.description: 特朗普政府周五终止了美国对价值低于800美元的包裹的免税进口，这种所谓的 "微量 "豁免推动了全球卖家向美国消费者发货量的激增，而美国消费者现在可能将面临更高的价格。【原文：The Trump administration on Friday ended U.S. duty-free imports of packages worth less than $800, the so-called "de minimis" exemption that has fueled a surge in shipments from global sellers to U.S. consumers who will now likely face higher prices.】

item.title: 美国低价值包裹关税豁免结束，托运人和消费者成本增加
item.description: 美国对价值 800 美元以下的包裹运输的关税豁免于周五结束，这提高了电子商务公司、使用在线市场的小企业和消费者的成本，并扰乱了他们的供应链模式。【原文：The U.S. tariff exemption for package shipments valued under $800 ended on Friday, raising costs and disrupting supply chain models for e-commerce companies, small businesses using online marketplaces and consumers alike.】

item.title: 前印度央行行长乌尔吉特-帕特尔被任命为国际货币基金组织（IMF）执行董事
item.description: 印度政府周五发表声明称，前印度储备银行行长乌尔吉特-帕特尔（Urjit Patel）已被任命为国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）执行董事。【原文：Former Reserve Bank of India Governor Urjit Patel has been appointed as executive director at the International Monetary Fund, a government statement showed on Friday.】

item.title: 马斯克要求驳回美国证券交易委员会关于其持有 2022 股 Twitter 股份的诉讼
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四提出动议，要求驳回美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）的民事诉讼，该委员会指控马斯克在2022年披露其在推特（Twitter）所持巨额股份的时间过长。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk on Thursday filed a motion to dismiss the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's civil lawsuit that accused him of waiting too long in 2022 to reveal his large stake in Twitter.】

item.title: 市场等待美国通胀数据，华尔街提振亚洲市场情绪高涨
item.description: 周五亚洲股市走高，搭上了华尔街科技股反弹的顺风车，投资者目前的焦点转向当天晚些时候将公布的美国关键通胀数据，以寻找有关美联储利率前景的进一步线索。【原文：Asian stocks edged higher on Friday, riding a tech-driven rally on Wall Street, with investor focus now turning to a key U.S. inflation reading due later in the day for further clues on the Federal Reserve's rate outlook.】

item.title: 韩国将增加预算支出，以促进人工智能引领的增长
item.description: 韩国新任总统试图通过促进人工智能投资的政策来刺激经济增长，因此韩国政府计划以四年来最大幅度提高明年的预算支出。【原文：South Korea's government plans to raise budget spending for next year by the steepest pace in four years as the country's new president seeks to spur economic growth through a policy of boosting investment in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 新加坡淡马锡过去二十年的主要变化
item.description: 新加坡国家投资公司淡马锡（TEM.UL）周四宣布对其业务进行重大重组，这标志着该公司 51 年历史上最重大的结构性转变之一。【原文：Singapore's state investment company Temasek (TEM.UL) announced on Thursday a major reorganisation of its operations, marking one of the most significant structural shifts in its 51-year history.】

item.title: 油价因需求担忧而下跌，但本周有望上涨
item.description: 油价周五下跌，但本周仍将上涨，原因是随着夏季需求期的结束，全球最大的石油用户美国的需求预期将下降，而俄罗斯的供应又存在不确定性。【原文：Oil prices fell on Friday but are set for a weekly gain, caught between expectations of lower demand in the U.S., the world's biggest oil user, as the summer demand period is ending and uncertainty around the availability of Russian supply.】

item.title: YouTube与福克斯达成协议以防止中断
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 YouTube 和福克斯公司周四表示，双方已达成协议，将继续向 YouTube TV 用户提供福克斯新闻、福克斯体育和其他福克斯频道。【原文：Alphabet-owned YouTube and Fox said on Thursday they have reached an agreement that will keep Fox News, Fox Sports and other Fox channels available to YouTube TV subscribers.】

item.title: 美元将因降息赌注而出现月度下跌
item.description: 由于美联储下月降息的可能性上升，同时对美国中央银行独立性受到威胁的担忧挥之不去，美元汇率周五出现波动，8月份兑主要货币有望下跌2%。【原文：The dollar wobbled on Friday, poised for a 2% drop in August against major currencies on rising odds of the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates next month while worries about the threats to the U.S. central bank's independence linger.】

item.title: 消息人士称巴西启动评估美国关税报复的正式程序
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，巴西外交部周四晚间下令政府贸易机构 Camex 开始分析是否可以利用当地的互惠法来对付美国。【原文：Brazil's Foreign Ministry ordered government trade body Camex on Thursday evening to start analyzing whether a local reciprocity law could be used against the United States, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，据说边疆航空公司董事长将与精神航空公司高管会面
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，美国精神航空公司（Spirit Aviation）已与竞争对手边疆集团（Frontier Group）进行了高层会谈，商讨该航空公司在破产不到六个月后，如何继续努力开辟前进的道路。【原文：Spirit Aviation has engaged rival Frontier Group in high-level talks about the carrier's ongoing efforts to chart a path forward less than six months after emerging from bankruptcy, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司报告年度亏损收窄
item.description: 澳大利亚星空娱乐公司周五公布的年度亏损额有所收窄，这得益于未计提拖累去年盈利的巨额减值费用，尽管补救成本和顾客消费低迷继续对公司的盈利底线造成压力。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment reported a narrower annual loss on Friday, helped by the absence of a massive impairment charge that weighed on last year's earnings, though remediation costs and subdued patron spending continued to pressure the bottom line.】

item.title: 维珍澳大利亚公司报告年度利润增长 28
item.description: 周五，维珍澳大利亚公司公布了其全年基本利润增长近 28%，这是自上市以来的首次业绩增长，主要得益于其航空公司和忠诚度计划部门的强劲表现。【原文：Virgin Australia reported a near 28% rise in its full-year underlying profit on Friday, in its first result since listing back, driven by strong performance in its airline and loyalty program segments.】

item.title: 特朗普的美联储人选米兰将于 9 月 4 日接受参议院听证
item.description: 美国参议院银行委员会将于 9 月 4 日举行听证会，审议唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的联邦储备委员会成员斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）。【原文：The U.S. Senate Banking Committee will hold a hearing September 4 to consider President Donald Trump's nominee to the Federal Reserve Board, Stephen Miran, it said in a notice issued Thursday.】

item.title: 美国参议员怀登和沃伦就网络攻击后的贷款偿还问题向 UnitedHealth 施压
item.description: 美国参议员罗恩-怀登（Ron Wyden）和伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）致信 UnitedHealth 高管，要求他们提供有关该医疗集团在其技术部门去年遭受网络攻击后提供贷款的信息。【原文：U.S. Senators Ron Wyden and Elizabeth Warren wrote a letter to UnitedHealth executives asking for information about the loans the healthcare conglomerate provided after the cyberattack at its tech unit last year.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒认为未来 3-6 个月降息将从 9 月开始
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周四进一步呼吁削减美国短期借贷成本，称他将支持下月降息，并在未来三到六个月内进一步降息，以防止劳动力市场崩溃。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller on Thursday stepped up his call for cutting short-term U.S. borrowing costs, saying he would support an interest-rate cut next month and further reductions over the next three to six months to prevent the labor market from collapsing.】

item.title: 网络安全需求强劲，SentinelOne 上调年度收入预期
item.description: SentinelOne 公司周四上调了年度营收预期，这表明市场对该公司网络安全工具的需求不断增长，公司股价在盘后交易中大涨约 9%。【原文：SentinelOne raised annual revenue forecast on Thursday, a sign of growing demand for the company's cybersecurity tools, sending its shares surging around 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 互联网论坛 4chan 在美国就言论自由问题起诉英国监管机构
item.description: 美国网络论坛 4chan 和 Kiwi Farms 在美国对英国媒体监管机构 Ofcom 提起诉讼，称其执行英国网络安全法的行为侵犯了美国人的言论自由权。【原文：U.S. internet forums 4chan and Kiwi Farms have filed a legal case in the United States against Britain's media regulator Ofcom, saying its enforcement of the country's online safety law violated Americans' right to freedom of speech.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 因需求稳定和英国扩张而上调年度预期，大放异彩
item.description: Ulta Beauty 周四上调了全年销售额和利润预期，此前该公司的季度销售额高于预期，这主要得益于其门店对彩妆和护肤品牌的稳定需求，以及库存损失的减少。【原文：Ulta Beauty raised its annual sales and profit forecast after topping quarterly sales estimates on Thursday, banking on steady demand for makeup and skincare brands at its stores as well as lower inventory losses.】

item.title: 巴西副总统阿尔克明预计明年将与墨西哥达成部门贸易协议
item.description: 巴西副总统杰拉尔多-阿尔克明（Geraldo Alckmin）周四在与墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）会晤后表示，巴西和墨西哥计划于明年八月签署一项互补性贸易协议。【原文：Brazil and Mexico plan to sign a deal for complementary trade agreements in August of next year, Brazil's Vice President Geraldo Alckmin said on Thursday after a meeting with Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum.】

item.title: 业内人士称，美国保险公司可能会在今年承保更新的 COVID 疫苗
item.description: 两家保险贸易组织的消息人士称，即使美国食品和药物管理局将COVID-19疫苗的接种范围限制在65岁及以上人群或有健康问题的人群，今年秋季美国医疗保险对COVID-19疫苗的广泛覆盖范围也不会改变。【原文：Broad U.S. health insurance coverage of the COVID-19 vaccine is not likely to change this fall even after the Food and Drug Administration limited the shot to people 65 and older or those with health conditions, sources at two insurance trade organizations said.】

item.title: 人工智能首次在美国网球公开赛中提供 3D 网球和聊天式解说
item.description: 在今年的美国网球公开赛上，网球迷现在可以观看世界顶级选手以 3D 动画形式进行的对决，同时还可以与人工智能解说员聊天。【原文：Tennis fans at this year's U.S Open can now watch the world's top players battle it out in 3D cartoon form while chatting with an AI commentator that has been trained to bite its digital tongue when things get heated.】

item.title: 软件需求增长，欧特克上调年度预期，股价上涨
item.description: 欧特克（Autodesk）周四上调了年度营收和利润预期，看好其设计和工程软件需求的增长，股价在盘后交易中大涨约 12%。【原文：Autodesk raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, betting on growing demand for its design and engineering software, sending its shares surging around 12% in extended trading.】

item.title: 特朗普官员称美国结束低价值包裹关税豁免是永久性的
item.description: 特朗普政府官员周四表示，美国对价值低于800美元的包裹运输的关税豁免将于周五永久终止，并将有六个月的过渡期，在此期间，邮政服务托运人可以根据原产国选择对每个包裹支付80至200美元的统一关税。【原文：The U.S. tariff exemption for package shipments valued under $800 ends permanently on Friday, with a six-month transition period under which postal service shippers can opt to pay a flat duty of $80 to $200 per package depending on the country of origin, Trump administration officials said on Thursday.】

item.title: 交易日 美联储希望提振股市，美元受挫
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 卡特彼勒将 2025 年关税成本估算上调至多达 18 亿美元
item.description: 卡特彼勒周四上调了对 2025 年关税相关成本的估计，理由是额外的征税和澄清，导致其股价在延时交易中下跌 3%。【原文：Caterpillar on Thursday raised its estimate of tariff-related costs for 2025, citing additional levies and clarifications, sending its shares down 3% in extended trading.】

item.title: 应用材料公司首席财务官称政府支持的代工厂举措不会改变预测
item.description: 应用材料公司首席财务官布里斯-希尔（Brice Hill）周四表示，包括英特尔在内的芯片制造商代工部门最近传出的消息不会改变其对高端芯片制造工具需求的预测。【原文：Applied Materials CFO Brice Hill said on Thursday recent news at chipmakers' foundry units including Intel will not change its forecast for high-end chipmaking tools demand.】
